// Store holds application state, allows access to state via getState() and state to be updated via dispatch(action).
import{applyMiddleware,createStore,compose,combineReducers}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import TeamsReducer from'./reducers/TeamsReducer';import PlayersReducer from'./reducers/PlayersReducer';import StarPlayersReducer from'./reducers/StarPlayersReducer';var rootReducer=combineReducers({teams:TeamsReducer,players:PlayersReducer,star_players:StarPlayersReducer});var store=createStore(rootReducer,compose(applyMiddleware(thunk),window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__()));export default store;
